Sync &

Partnership

To further our mission of creating artist sustainability, we thrive on developing forward-
thinking opportunities for our roster to expand their audience with partners that build
impactful narratives around their music.

Recent collaborators

Explore some of our latest partnerships and activations with innovative platforms and games such as Rocket League, Fortnite,
and SMITE.

WE'VE HAPPILY WORKED WITH

What our Partners Think

"

This collaboration really brings
Monstercat's music and artists
to life in SMITE, with authentic
audio and special touches
Monstercat fans will love.
There's something magical
about hearing a sick Slushii
drop perfectly timed to a burst
of damage.

"

ALEX CANTATORE

Hi-Rez Studios Senior Brand
Director of Live Games

"

Monstercat has become an
intrinsic partner in the identity
of Rocket League. We have
grown as partners together
and in their tenth year as a
label, we are happy to
celebrate all that they have
become and what we have
become together

"

MIKE AULT

Audio Director at Psyonix

"

This collaboration really brings
Monstercat's music and artists
to life in SMITE, with authentic
audio and special touches
Monstercat fans will love.
There's something magical
about hearing a sick Slushii
drop perfectly timed to a burst
of damage.

"

JAROSLAV BECK

Co-founder & Head of Music at Beat Games

INTERESTED IN BECOMING
A PARTNER? LET'S TALK!

We love collaborating with like-minded entities that want to drive
impactful campaigns through music. Have an idea of partnering
with Monstercat? Reach out to our partnerships team and let's
discuss!

LOOKING TO LICENSE MUSIC?

Whether you need a music license for your non-profit organization or for a AAA video game development, our Sync and
Partnerships team is ready to help! Email us at
: licensing@monstercat.com
